titleStmt.title: The breuiarie of health vvherin doth folow, remedies, for all maner of sicknesses & diseases, the which may be in man or woman. Expressing the obscure termes of Greke, Araby, Latin, Barbary, and English, concerning phisick and chirurgerie. Compyled by Andrew Boord, Doctor of phisicke: an English-man.
titleStmt.author: Boorde, Andrew, 1490?-1549.

editionStmt.edition: Now newly corrected and amended, with some approued medicines that neuer were in print before this impression, & are aptly placed in their proper chapters, by men skilfull in phisicke and chirurgerie.

notesStmt.note: "The second booke of the breuiary of health" has separate dated title page, foliation and register.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
